messages.message: Incompatible KTXcubemapIncomplete and layerCount. layerCount must be the multiple of the number of faces present.
messages.details: layerCount is 3 and KTXcubemapIncomplete indicates 2 faces present but layerCount must the multiple of the number of faces present.

messages.message: Non-conformant texture file accepted by libktx.
messages.details: KTX 2.0 file does not conform to the specification but it is currently accepted by libktx.
